gameDetails.name: Mondo Sapiens Micro
gameDetails.description:
Mondo Micro is a 2 player Expansion for Mondo Sapiens, and is also compatible with Mondo.

The new player board lays between both players and will be played with the "first-time" rules, except the timer will be set at 3 only minutes.

The board has two different player boards (double-sided).

It also contains a small variant: Before a round choose 2 identical tiles (various animals are allowed). Place one with random direction on one of the fields which differs to the colors of the other fields. The second player has to use the 2nd tile in the same orientation.
